stimulusHtml: Two long parallel wires have currents of I1 and I2 and are a distance d apart. The force per unit length exerted by one wire on the other is F ∕ L . The current in each wire is doubled, and the distance between the wires is reduced to d ∕ 2 . The new force per unit length is
choicesHtml: 2 F L MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BC1@

4 F L MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BC3@

8 F L MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BC7@
